Package BusinessLogic

Class Year

java.lang.Object
BusinessLogic.Year
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Year>
public class Year extends Object implements Comparable<Year>
Represents a year with its associated months. Implements the Comparable interface to enable comparison between years.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Year other)
      Compares this Year object with another Year object based on their current years.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Year>
      Parameters:
      other - The Year object to compare with.
      Returns:
      A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this object is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified object.

    • findMonthByNumber

      public Month findMonthByNumber(int monthNumber) throws MonthNotFoundException
      Finds and returns the month with the specified month number.
      Parameters:
      monthNumber - The number of the month to find.
      Returns:
      The Month object with the specified month number.
      Throws:
      MonthNotFoundException - If the specified month number is not found in the year.
